channel.title: Tackle the Numbers
channel.itunes:subtitle: Breaking down the stats of Major League Rugby
channel.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
channel.itunes:summary: Join host Alistair Poole on his journey through the statistics of North America's professional rugby scene. From stats-based power rankings of every team in the league to deep dives on the importance of scrums, this show aims to leave no number undiscussed. Comes out weekly during the season, and monthly in the offseason.
channel.description: Join host Alistair Poole on his journey through the statistics of North America's professional rugby scene. From stats-based power rankings of every team in the league to deep dives on the importance of scrums, this show aims to leave no number undiscussed. Comes out weekly during the season, and monthly in the offseason.

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Introducing Tackle the Numbers
item.itunes:summary:
This podcast is dedicated to exploring the numbers and statistics behind Major League Rugby, North America's very own professional rugby competition. From stats-based power rankings of every team in the league to deep dives on the importance of scrums, this show aims to leave no stat undiscussed.
Links Alternate Reality Explorer: https://gloriousrugby.com/alternate-reality/ Beat the Machine: https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com/
Get in touch: tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com
item.description:
This podcast is dedicated to exploring the numbers and statistics behind Major League Rugby, North America's very own professional rugby competition. From stats-based power rankings of every team in the league to deep dives on the importance of scrums, this show aims to leave no stat undiscussed.
Links Alternate Reality Explorer: https://gloriousrugby.com/alternate-reality/ Beat the Machine: https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com/
Get in touch: tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: The Model
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode of Tackle the Numbers, I dive deep into my predictive model for Major League Rugby. I get into the philosophy behind it, as well as explaining how it works and why.
Beat the Machine: https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com/
Get in touch: tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com
item.description:
In this episode of Tackle the Numbers, I dive deep into my predictive model for Major League Rugby. I get into the philosophy behind it, as well as explaining how it works and why.
Beat the Machine: https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com/
Get in touch: tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: 2021 Season Preview & Week 1 Matches
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode I lay out where each team stands at the start of the season. Toronto and San Diego are at the top, but some of the other teams may surprise you. After that, I dive into the week 1 matches and what my predictive model can tell us about each matchup.
Pick against my system at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

Pick against my system at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 1 Review + Week 2 Preview
item.itunes:summary:
Week 1 was exactly as crazy and wonderfully as we could have every hoped. Favorites fell and challengers rose in tight matches all weekend long. I'll break down the numbers of what we saw, and wht it tells us going into next week.
Pick against my model at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com
item.description:

Pick against my model at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 3
item.itunes:summary:
Week two has come and gone, leaving absolute chaos in it's wake. We saw a shut out, several upsets, and 57 point blowout. I break down all of it in this episode, and put forward some predictions for next week.
Pick against my numbers at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com Watch this episode on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bo2LLjnxVc
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 4
item.itunes:summary:
It was a short slate of matches last weekend, but not short on upsets. I break down that and the matches coming up in week 4 in this episode.
Pick against my numbers at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com Watch this episode on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bo2LLjnxVc
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 6
item.itunes:summary:
Finally, some sanity! Week 6 brought very few upsets and some brilliant rugby. I look at how it affected the rankings and preview next weekend's matches.
Pick against my numbers at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com Watch this episode on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bo2LLjnxVc
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 7
item.itunes:summary:
Officially back on track with my predictions, I dive into how week 6 of Major League Rugby affected the rankings and put forward predictions for week 7.
Pick against my numbers at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com Watch this episode on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bo2LLjnxVc
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com

item.itunes:author: Alistair Poole
item.title: Week 11
item.itunes:summary:
After a few weeks for microphone problems, I'm back to tackle reiews of the week 10 matches and preview the upcoming matches for week 11.
Pick against my numbers at https://tacklethenumbers.gloriousrugby.com Watch this episode on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Bo2LLjnxVc
Contact me at tacklethenumbers@gloriousrugby.com
